direction.raw_text: : Stars. The upbeat show tune, Put On Your Sunday Clothes, plays. "Out there, there's a world outside of Yonkers..." More stars. Distant galaxies, constellations, nebulas... A single planet. Drab and brown. Moving towards it. Pushing through its polluted atmosphere.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Close your eyes and see it glisten..."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A range of mountains takes form in the haze. Moving closer. The mountains are piles of TRASH. The entire surface is nothing but waste.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...We're gonna find adventure in the evening air..." A silhouetted city in the distance. What looks like skyscrapers turns into trash. Thousands of neatly stacked CUBES OF TRASH, stories high. Rows and rows of stacked cubes, like city avenues. They go on for miles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Beneath your parasol the world is all a smile..." Something moving on the ground far below. A figure at the foot of a trash heap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: diligently cubing trash. Rusted, ancient. Cute. Every inch of him engineered for trash compacting. Mini-shovel hands collect junk. Scoop it into his open chassis. His front plate closes slowly, compressing waste. A faded label on his corroded chest plate: "Waste Allocation Loader - Earth Class" (WALL-E) Wall-E spits out a cube of trash. Stacks it with the others.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Something catches his eye. Tugs on a piece of metal stuck in the stack. A hubcap. The sun reflects off it. Wall-E checks the sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The sun sets through the smoggy haze.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...And we won't come back until we've kissed a girl --" He places the hubcap in his compactor. Presses a button on his chest. The song stops playing. The end of a work day. Wall-E attaches a lunch cooler to his back. Whistles for his pet COCKROACH. The insect hops on his shoulder. They motor down from the top of a GIANT TRASH TOWER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E travels alone. Traverses miles of desolate waste. Oblivious to roving storms of toxic weather. Passes haunting structures buried within the trash. Buildings, highways, entire cities... Everything branded with the SAME COMPANY LOGO. "Buy N Large"
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: stores, restaurants, banks...transportation! The corporation ran every aspect of life. There's even a BNL LOGO on Wall-E's chest plate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E drives over. Headline: "TOO MUCH TRASH!! Earth Covered!!" The deck: "BNL CEO Declares Global Emergency!" A photo of the BNL CEO giving a weak smile. Wall-E's old treads are threadbare. Practically falling apart. Cause a bumpy ride for his cockroach. He passes the remains of other RUSTED WALL-E UNITS. Fancies one with NEWER TREADS than his own...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E now sports the newer treads. Rolls past a SERIES OF HOLOGRAPHIC BILLBOARDS. The solar-powered ads still activate when he passes them.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) (Ad #1: BNL logo over trash) Too much garbage in your face? (Ad #2: starliner in space) There's plenty of space out in space! (Ad #3: starliners take off from Earth)
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: starliners leaving each day. (Ad #4: WALL-E units wave goodbye) We'll clean up the mess while you're away.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Wall-E drives down a deserted overpass. Activates an even LARGER HOLOGRAPHIC BILLBOARD.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shows off a CITY-SIZED LUXURY STARLINER. Depicts passengers enjoying all its amenities.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The BNL CEO appears at the end. Waves goodbye as the Axiom takes off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The holographic billboard powers off. Reveals the AXIOM'S DESERTED LAUNCHPAD in the distance. The mammoth structure sits across the bay. Now empty and dry. A polluted, dead valley.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) The jewel of the BNL fleet: "The Axiom". Spend your five year cruise in style. Waited on 24 hours a day by our fully automated crew, while your Captain and Autopilot chart a course for non-stop entertainment, fine dining. And with our all-access hover chairs, even Grandma can join the fun! There's no need to walk! "The Axiom". Putting the "star" in Executive Starliner.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Because, at BNL, space is the final "fun"- tier.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Near its edge rests a WALL-E UNIT TRANSPORT TRUCK. A giant child's Tonka Truck left to weather the elements. A "Buy N Large" logo on its side. Wall-E approaches the rear of the truck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Pulls on a lever. The back lowers. Wall-E motors up the ramp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Open racks for storing WALL-Es line both walls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: littered everywhere. The tired robot removes his newfound treads. Ahh... Home. Wall-E motors down the center aisle. Flicks on an ancient BETAMAX PLAYER. Jury-rigged to an iPod. Pushes in a cassette labeled, "Hello Dolly!" The image is very poor quality. Actors sing and dance to Put On Your Sunday Clothes (POYSC). The same song Wall-E worked to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E opens his cooler. Newfound knickknacks. Pulls out the hubcap from his chest. Looks back at the TV. Mimics the dancers on the screen. Pretends the hubcap is a hat. Continues to unpack: A spork. A Rubik's Cube (unsolved). A Zippo Lighter. He presses a BUTTON by the rack of shelves. They rotate until an empty space appears. His new items are lovingly added to the shelf. The Zippo joins a pre-existing LIGHTER COLLECTION. A new song, It Only Takes A Moment, plays on the video. Wall-E is drawn to it. Presses his "Record" button.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two lovers sing gently to one another. They kiss...hold hands... Wall-E tilts his head as he watches. Curious. Holds his own hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E motors outside. Turns over his Igloo cooler to clean it out. Pauses to take in the night sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: struggle to be seen through the polluted haze. Wall-E presses the "Play" button on his chest. The newly sampled It Only Takes A Moment (IOTAM) plays. The wind picks up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: sounds on Wall-E's chest. He looks out into the night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: approaches off the bay... Unfazed, Wall-E heads back in the truck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: still gently playing. ...The massive wave of sand roars closer... Wall-E raises the door. Pauses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: for his cockroach to come inside. The door shuts just as the storm hits. Obliterates everything in view.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E alone in the center of his shelter. Unwraps a BNL SPONGECAKE (think Twinkie). Lays it out for the cockroach to sleep in. It happily dives in. Wall-E collapses himself into a storable cube. Backs into an empty shelf space. Rocks it like a cradle... ...and shuts down for the night. Outside the wind howls like the Hounds of Hell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E's CHARGE METER flashes "WARNING". He wakes. Unboxes. Groggy and lifeless. Stumbles outside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The morning sun. Wall-E fully exposed in its light. His front panel splayed out like a tanning shield. A solar collector.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . His CHARGE METER chimes full. Solar panels fold away into hiding. Wall-E, now awake, collects his lunch cooler. Heads off to work. ...and accidentally runs over the cockroach. Horrified, Wall-E reverses. Reveals the FLATTENED INSECT under his tread. The cockroach simply pops back to life. No biggie. Ready to go. Relieved, Wall-E resumes their commute.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : - CU of Wall-E's hands digging into garbage.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: EXT.
location: THAT MORNING A SERIES OF "WALL-E AT WORK" MOMENTS

direction.raw_text: of trash being scooped into his chest compactor. A cube lands by the cockroach. - Wall-E discovers a BRA in the garbage. Unsure what it's for. Tries placing it over his eyes, like glasses. Tosses it in his cooler. - Wall-E finds a set of CAR KEYS. Presses the remote lock. Somewhere in the distance a CAR ALARM CHIRPS. - Plays with a paddle ball. The ball keeps smacking him in the face. He doesn't like it. - Wall-E discovers a DIAMOND RING in a JEWEL CASE. Throws out the ring. Keeps the case. The jewel case drops into the cooler, then... ...A RUBBER DUCKY... ...A BOBBLE HEAD DOLL... ...An OLD BOOT... ...A TROPHY... - Wall-E finds a FIRE EXTINGUISHER. Activates it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: blasts in his face. It's tossed far, far away from his cooler. - Wall-E's shovel hand strikes something solid. Faces a REFRIGERATOR much larger than himself. Now what? - CU on fridge door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: moves down its center. It emits from between Wall-E's SPLIT BINOCULAR EYES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The door falls apart in two pieces. Reveals... ...a SMALL PLANT in its early stage of growth. Wall-E is entranced. Carefully, he extracts the section of earth around it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E gently places the plant inside the old boot. Dusts dirt off the leaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Robot and faithful cockroach return home. Wall-E stops short of the threshold. Stares at the ground. Continues staring.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: quivers on the dirt. A single laser point of light. Wall-E moves to touch it... ...The dot races along the ground. Wall-E drops his Igloo. Chases after the dot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The dot leads Wall-E deep into the polluted expanse. He is so fixated on it he doesn't notice
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: coming from every direction. All racing into the valley over the contour of the terrain. Triangulating towards a center. Wall-E's dot suddenly stops. Slowly he reaches for it. Can't grab it. Just light.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: converge in front of him. The ground shakes. Wall-E becomes confused. Doesn't see above him. The SUN growing brighter behind the cloud cover. A noise. Building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Rocket engines. Wall-E senses he should look to the sky. Now THREE SUNS are descending on him. Wall-E runs for it. An enormous COLUMN OF FIRE blocks his path. A second column of fire. A third. Trapped. Wall-E cubes the ground beneath him. Working fast. Noise deafening. Heat rising. Digs in just as a tide of flame carpets the ground... ...Then suddenly quiet. Smoke clears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E's head rises out of the dirt. Glows red hot from the heat. Trembles with fright. Everything in shadow. Something very big looms over him. Wall-E climbs out of his hole. Bangs his head on metal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: on a massive SPACESHIP. Rests ominously in the empty bay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: on its underside opens. Frightened, Wall-E tries to hide. Nowhere to go. He places a SMALL ROCK on his head. Boxes up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: lowers to the ground on a long stem. Scans the surface. Wall-E creeps closer for a better look. The device unfolds. Wall-E boxes up again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: descends from a chute in the stem.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: emerge from the device. Place the capsule on the ground. Press buttons. The capsule falls away in sections, to reveal... ...a PROBE ROBOT. It hovers gracefully above the ground. White. Egg-shaped.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Blue-lit eyes. Female. Eve. Wall-E is transfixed. Inches closer. Watches Eve from behind the device. Tilts his head. Time stops. She's the most beautiful thing he's ever seen. Eve hovers over the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: emits from her front panel. Fans out 180 degrees. Scans random objects and areas. The device rises back into the ship. Exposes Wall-E. He rushes for cover behind the nearest rock. Never takes his eyes off Eve. Watches her float away from the ship. ...from the ship? The ship! Engines roar back to life. Wall-E digging furiously. The rocket takes off. Smoke clears. Again, a red hot Wall-E peeks out from the ground. Looks for Eve. She is watching the ship rise into the clouds. Waits until it is completely out of sight... ...then Eve rises high up into the air. She flies around the bay. Soars like a graceful bird. Does loops in the sky. Zooms right past Wall-E's rock. He is hypnotized. Eve descends gently to the ground... Wall-E sneaks up closer. Hides behind another boulder. Slips. Makes a NOISE. Instantly, Eve whips around. Her arm converts into a LASER CANNON. Blasts Wall-E's boulder to smithereens. ...Smoke clears...All quiet. Eve, now cold and dangerous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Scans the area. No sign of life. All business again. Hovers away to probe more of the planet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E boxed up behind what little remains of the rock. Trembles uncontrollably.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: ON OTHER SIDE OF BOULDER CRATER

direction.raw_text: Eve wanders through the pillars of cubed trash. Scans random areas. Wall-E spies from the shadows. Too frightened to approach. She moves on. He follows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve probes a mound of tires. Wall-E hiding nearby. He flinches at the sight of
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: innocently approaching Eve from behind. She spins around. Blasts the insect. Wall-E is gut-punched. The cockroach climbs out of the smoking crater. Unscathed. Still curious. Eve finds the insect intriguing. Lowers her arm. The end separates into individual hovering sections... ...A HAND. She lets the insect crawl up her arm. Wiggles into her workings. It tickles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E relaxes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: privately. Eve sonically picks up Wall-E's location. Locks onto him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Arm converts to laser cannon. Fires rapidly. Quick glimpses of Wall-E dodging the blasts. Trash piles are systematically obliterated around him. Wall-E now exposed. Nowhere to hide. Boxes himself up. Shakes uncontrollably. Eve holds her fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She slowly approaches Wall-E's box. Keeps her gun trained on him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E peeks out from his box. Doesn't understand a thing she says. Doesn't care. Can't believe she's real. The cockroach climbs down her gun arm. Jumps onto his master. Eve scans Wall-E.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: appears on her chest. Buzzes "negative". He's not what she's looking for. She retracts her gun arm. Hovers off. Wall-E watches her go. Lovestruck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve scans through the market. Wall-E follows from a safe distance. A stray puppy-dog. Eve glances over at him. Wall-E panics. Bumps into a RACK OF SHOPPING CARTS. Creates an avalanche.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . They chase him down a flight of stairs. Wall-E reaches the exit doors. Won't open! Carts pig pile on top of him.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: INT.
location: NEXT DAY LOUIS ARMSTRONG'S "LA VIE EN ROSE" PLAYS

direction.raw_text: Wall-E perched on the roof. Patiently watches Eve fly. She scans the ground below her, like a searchlight. Eve comes in for a landing below. Shuts down for the night. Wall-E waits. Quietly sneaks down the refinery fire escape. Accidentally trips. Tumbles to the ground. Eve doesn't wake. Wall-E creeps up to her. Opens his arms wide... ...and measures her. Turns to a pile of trash. Splits open his eyes. Begins welding something...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve powers up again. Does a double take.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: stands in front of her. She hovers away, unimpressed. Doesn't notice Wall-E hiding behind a PILE OF PIPES. Wall-E kicks the pipes in frustration. They roll on top of him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - Scans a car engine. Negative. Slams the hood shut. - Scans a Port-A-Potty. Negative. Slams the door shut. - Scans an Apollo capsule. Negative. Slams the hatch shut. - Scans a FREIGHTER HOLD.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Negative. Slams the lid shut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve hovers over the freighter. Frustrated. Not finding what she's looking for. Wall-E eavesdrops from afar. Eve flies past the ship's CRANE MAGNET. Gets stuck. Wrestles to free herself. Furious, she BLOWS UP THE ENTIRE SHIP. The reaction startles Wall-E. Eve slumps down against a dredged anchor. She gives up. Concerned, Wall-E cautiously approaches. Sits at the other end of the anchor. Both robots stare silently at the fiery wreck. Then... ...slowly, very slowly, Wall-E inches towards her. Musters the courage to speak, when -- She suddenly turns to him:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E falls backwards with surprise. Me? Eve scrolls through a variety of languages:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E eagerly turns to some nearby trash. Scoops it into his compactor. Proudly spits out a cube. Points to Eve.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She scans his CHEST LOGO.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E nearly melts. She says his name so beautifully. Moves closer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E tries to repeat it:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She giggles again. Wall-E likes making her giggle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The wind kicks up. The WARNING LIGHT sounds on Wall-E's chest. He moves to grab her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She draws her gun on him. Doesn't understand the danger. The sandstorm rushes up behind her. Too late. Wall-E collapses into a box. The storm hits full force. Eve is instantly lost, disoriented.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (hums) [Hey watch it! Don't come any closer!]
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: appears out of the dust. Calmly takes Eve's hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The back door lowers. A rush of wind and sand. Wall-E pulls Eve inside. Closes the door. She coughs up dust. Wall-E hits a switch... Strings of CHRISTMAS LIGHTS fill the space. His racks of oddities painted in colored light.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . An air of enchantment. Eve is taken aback.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She drifts through the sea of knickknacks. Becomes spooked by a SINGING BILLY BASS FISH. Threatens to shoot it, but Wall-E calms her down. He is compelled to show her everything. Hands her an eggbeater... ...bubble wrap (so infectious to pop)... ...a lightbulb (lights when she holds it)... ...the Rubik's Cube (she solves it immediately)... ...his Hello Dolly tape. Curious, she begins unspooling the tape.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He grabs it back. Protective. Inserts it carefully into the VCR. Please still work. The movie eventually appears on the TV. Plays a clip of POYSC. Wall-E is relieved.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mimics the dancing for Eve. Encourages her to try. She clumsily hops up and down. Makes dents in the floor. Rattles everything. Wall-E politely stops her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Spins in a circle. Arms out. Eve copies. Spins faster, and faster... Too fast. Accidentally strikes Wall-E. He flies into the shelves. Eve helps him up from the mess. Wall-E's LEFT BINOCULAR EYE falls off. Dangles from two wires. Eve GASPS with concern. Wall-E placates her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Feels his way to the rack of shelves. Rotates them until... ...SPARE WALL-E PARTS appear. Replaces his broken eye with a new one. Eve is relieved. She eyes his LIGHTER COLLECTION. Flicks open a Zippo. Ignites a FLAME. Wall-E freezes. He had no idea it could do that. Moves closer to inspect it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's the closest he's ever been to Eve. She remains focused on the lighter. Wall-E stares up at her. ...The tiny flame flickering between them... ...The Hello Dolly video plays IOTAM in the background... Suddenly, he is moved to express his love. Musters the courage to open his fingers... ...Timidly reaches his hand out to hers...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve turns and looks at him. Wall-E instantly chokes. Pulls his hand back. Eve becomes intrigued with the TV. Scans the image of the lovers singing IOTAM... Wall-E watches her. His infatuation still palpable. Then he remembers...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He rushes to his shelves. Eve watches him rummage through junk. A drum falls down on his head. She giggles, charmed by it all. Something about Wall-E... She is drawn back to the lovers on TV... ...then the lit Zippo lighter in her hand. A tap on her shoulder. She turns to find Wall-E holding something. The plant. Eve immediately locks onto it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Drops the lighter. In a flash... ...her chest opens... ...a TRACTOR BEAM snatches the plant away... ...stores it inside her... Then she shuts down completely. Only a SINGLE GREEN LIGHT pulsing on her chest. Wall-E is stunned. What'd I do? Waves his hand in front of her face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Knocks on her chest plate. No response. Wall-E panics. Gently shakes her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Still no response.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: on the blinking green light...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The morning sun. Wall-E places Eve in his charging spot. Aims her hovering form to face the sun. Waits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : - Several hot days pass with Wall-E holding vigil in the heat. - A THUNDERSTORM approaches on the horizon. Wall-E holds an UMBRELLA over Eve. Gets struck by lightning. Holds up another umbrella. Gets struck again. - A SANDSTORM blows through. Wall-E pops out of a dune on the truck's roof. Lifts up an UPSIDE-DOWN BARREL that protected Eve.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . - Wall-E pries open a panel on Eve's chest. Reveals her pulsing BLUE HEART-BATTERY. Attaches JUMPER CABLES to his own HEART-BATTERY. Tries to connect the other end to hers. An automatic defense system blows him off truck. - Wall-E & cockroach take Eve for a walk. Pull her along on a LEASH OF CHRISTMAS LIGHTS. - Wall-E gives Eve a boat ride on a LAKE OF SLUDGE. Uses an industrial tire as a boat. Rows like a gondolier with a road sign. - Wall-E sits by the empty bay with Eve. Watches the SUNSET. Burns "WALL-E + EVE" on a public trash can. Tries to pull out her hand to hold it. It snaps back into place, trapping his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: EXT. ROOF OF WALL-E'S TRUCK - NIGHT Wall-E has set up the TV on the roof. The blank Eve floating next to him. Tries unsuccessfully to play PONG with her. Still no response. Finally, he gives up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E loads up his cooler. Checks on Eve one more time. Still nothing... Heads off to work, defeated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E simply going through the motions. No spirit in him at all. Stops. Pulls out the Zippo lighter. Flicks it a few times.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: blows out the flame. Distant rumbling. Wall-E looks in the direction of his home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is lowering down through the clouds.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E racing as fast as he can. The cockroach clings onto him for dear life.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The RECON SPACESHIP towers over his truck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: cherry-picks Eve from the roof. Lifts her up and into the ship's cargo hold. Wall-E racing in the distance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Reaches the end of the collapsed bridge ramp. Forced to watch Eve disappear into the ship. The cargo doors slam shut. The first of the THREE ROCKET ENGINES powers up. Wall-E heads down a hill of rubble to the ship. Notices his cockroach tagging along behind him. Leads it back to the top of the hill.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The insect mopes. Droops its little antennae. Wall-E motors back down to the rocket...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The engines blast a WALL OF SMOKE. Preparation for launch...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve is secured into a slot. Joins a ROW OF OTHER EVE PROBES. All dormant. Only Eve flashes a GREEN LIGHT. The CAMERA DRIFTS BACK out a window...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ...where Wall-E steadily climbs up the side. The ship's engines ignite. Wall-E clamps his hands tight to a metal support. The rocket takes off into space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The cockroach watches his master go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The spaceship roars through the sky. Wall-E tightens his grip, battling the G's. He looks ahead. SCREAMS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: litter the outer atmosphere. The ship bursts through the layer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The recon ship breaks free of the planet. Its boosters shut down. Wall-E takes in the sudden QUIETNESS OF SPACE. Looks back at his planet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Weightlessness takes effect. Wall-E almost floats away. Grabs hold of the ship. Knocks on a WINDOW near Eve.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No response. She remains shut down. Wall-E points out at the stars. It is the most spectacular light show possible. And Wall-E has a front row seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - The ship flies past the MOON.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: stands next to the abandoned APOLLO MOON ROVER.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Outlet Coming Soon." - The ship passes by the SUN. Wall-E pops open his solar panels.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Instantly recharges. - The ship cruises alongside SATURN'S OUTER RINGS. Wall-E runs his hand through the tiny particles of ice. DISSOLVE TO:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: slowly twists in space. Wall-E is mesmerized by it. Leads his eye to a LIGHT, growing in the distance ahead. A planet? No. A starliner. Gigantic in size. The "AXIOM". The now tiny recon ship heads straight for it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: guide the ship in. It locks into GIANT BRACES fixed on the deck. The impact knocks Wall-E off. He lands in the scaffolding of the front brace. Suddenly the entire dock comes to life. Robotic arms and service robots of all types appear. ...Rise from the floor... ..Lower from the ceiling... It's a cacophony of automation. They all attend to the ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and four other probes slide out of the ship's side. Suspended in a horizontal rack. Wall-E is surprised to find her facing him. She remains shut down. Just a few feet away with a giant abyss between them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: emerge onto the dock. A small roller BRUSH-BOT (M-O) leads.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Waits for the FLOOR LINES to appear. Depict their exact path of action.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They file out on the line. A crane-bot lowers Eve from the rack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and his cleaning crew stand ready.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: scans Eve.

The transport pulls up to the typing-bot. Gopher BEEPS. The typing-bot responds by typing. Slowly. One...button...at...a...time... Finally, the gate lowers. Elevator doors open. The typing-bot watches the transport enter the elevator. Notices Wall-E hiding at the back. Wall-E gives it a FRIENDLY WAVE as the doors close. The elevator shoots up to the bridge. dialogue.raw_text: (unmotivated) Well, good morning everybody, and welcome to day 255,642 aboard the Axiom. As always, weather's a balmy 72 degrees and sunny, and -- Oh, hey, I see the ship's log is showing that today is our 700th anniversary of our five year cruise. Well, I'm sure our forefathers would be proud to know that 700 years later we'd be... (deflates) ...doing the exact same thing...they were doing...

dialogue.raw_text: ! Be sure next mealtime to ask for your free... (hard to pronounce) ...septuacentennial cupcake -- in a cup. Also today we have, uh...uh...Hey, Auto, what's that flashing button? (mic feedback whine)

dialogue.raw_text: Greetings and congratulations, Captain! If you're seeing this, that means your Extraterrestrial Vegetation Evaluator, or... (air quotes) ..."EVE" probe, has returned from Earth with a confirmed specimen of ongoing photosynthesis!

dialogue.raw_text: Now that Earth has been restored to a life-sustaining status, by golly, we can begin "Operation Recolonize"!

dialogue.raw_text: Analysis: foreign contaminant. Substance is a three phase system composed of various combinations of naturally derived solids. Subject is most commonly referred to as "soil", "dirt", or "earth".
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: "Earth" - the surface of the world as distinct from the sky or sea.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: we see the Captain. Glued to his screen. Filled with ocean images.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The CAMERA DRIFTS AWAY from the window... ...Moves aft to the Axiom's stern... ...Pushes in...
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: ...an expanse of salt water that covers most of the Earth's surface and surrounds its land masses...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: continues to clean WALL-E'S FILTHY TRAIL. Oblivious to everything around him. Cuts through traffic. Robots crash into each other in his wake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: doesn't notice EVE AND WALL-E'S TRANSPORT drive past. They hover down a corridor, and enter...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a fully automated clinic for broken bots. Day care for the malfunctioned. The REJECTS are kept in FORCE FIELD PENS. Dozens line the walls. Eve and Wall-E stop at the INSPECTION STATION. Robotic ORDERLY-ARMS activate. Wall-E shrinks. Watches them systematically check in Eve. Perform an I.D. scan. Attach a RED "DEFECT" BOOT to her head. A button is pressed on the boot. Eve goes into "sleep" mode. Lifted off the transport.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The orderly-arms now start on Wall-E. He escapes before they can place a defect boot on him. Races through the ward. Wall-E runs smack into a defective BEAUTICIAN-BOT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She paints Wall-E's face with hideous looking make-up. Holds up a mirror. Wall-E gasps.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E is snatched up by an orderly-arm. Placed in an empty force field pen. Sits between a PAINT-BOT and VACU-BOT: ...The broken paint-bot flings paint at Wall-E... ...The vacu-bot sneezes dust in his face... Across the way a MASSAGE-BOT flails wildly. Orderly-arms restrain him with an ENERGY STRAIGHTJACKET. Eve slides past Wall-E. Carried by an orderly-arm. Brought into the "DIAGNOSTICS" ROOM. The frosted glass doors shut.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Orderly-arms run diagnostics on a few reject robots: - An UMBRELLA-BOT flips open and overextends. The orderly-arms struggle to close it. - A DEFIBRILLATOR-BOT shocks a CRASH-TEST-DUMMY. It bursts into flames. Eve is awoken from "sleep" mode. A series of tests begin. Eve is annoyed but calm. It's all routine. An orderly-arm easily detaches her gun arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E stares at the frosted glass doors. Can only make out EVE'S SILHOUETTE. To him, her arm is being ripped off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The orderly-arm tests Eve's circuitry. Her insides light up. It tickles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Next to her the UMBRELLA-BOT's mechanism SCREECHES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E watches in horror. It looks as if Eve is being tortured. Mistakes the screeching for her screams. Wall-E struggles to free himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She is washed and scrubbed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: cleans between her head and body. It feels good.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It looks as if Eve is being beheaded. He needs to stop the torture. Wall-E fires his CUTTING LASER at his pen's force field. The barrier shorts out. Wall-E tumbles to the floor. Lands on his "Play" button.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: blares across the ward. The Rejects all stop and stare.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E races to the diagnostics room. Crashes right through the glass doors. Finds Eve surrounded by orderly-arms. Grabs Eve's separated gun arm. Points it at the orderly-arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His hands tremble, Don Knotts-style. Doesn't realize... ...he's holding the gun backwards. Eve slowly reaches for the weapon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An orderly lunges at him. Wall-E panics. Shoots! The gun fires backwards. It blasts through the repair ward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Blows up the REPAIR WARD CONTROL PANEL. Wall-E shrinks. He knows he's in trouble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The smoking remains of the control panel SHORT CIRCUIT. ...All orderly-arms go limp... ...The repair ward doors open up... ...and all FORCE FIELDS disappear... The Rejects look at each other for a beat. Then CHEER wildly. We're free! The mob of robots all rush Wall-E. Lift him on their shoulders. Carry their hero out of the ward. Wall-E still holding on to Eve's gun arm. Eve watches in astonishment. This day just gets worse and worse. She flies off after them.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (angry beeps) [Let her go, or I'll shoot!]
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The rejects march Wall-E out the entrance. Their RED "DEFECT" BOOTS all blink. Activate a WARNING LIGHT above the doorway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: blinking. Activate an embedded ROW OF STEWARDS. They pop out of the wall. Race to the repair ward. Sirens wailing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The REJECT MOB stampedes through the halls. Disrupts all robot traffic. Wall-E carried over their heads. Suddenly, the mob stops in front of...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ...a BLOCKADE OF STEWARDS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E's dropped in front of them. Still holds Eve's gun. Cowers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: pushes Wall-E closer. Show `em who's boss.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve catches up to them. Flies over to Wall-E. Snatches her arm back. Just as she reattaches her gun... ...The steward CAMERA EYES take a snapshot of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alarms sound.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: appear, displaying EVE AND WALL-E'S IMAGE. She appears to brandish her gun at camera. Like Bonnie and Clyde. Their faces now on every wall... ...passenger's hover chair... ...cabin... ...hallway...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The stewards prepare to fire SUSPENSION BEAMS (like Gopher). Eve realizes what's about to happen. Grabs Wall-E. Flies over the stewards.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The mass of rejects take their cue. Robot rebellion! They bust through the steward blockade.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Robots recognize Eve and Wall-E as they fly past.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Match them with the "Wanted" screens. Call attention to them. Point. Stewards in hot pursuit. Eve hides herself and Wall-E in a PORTHOLE CUBBY. Lets the stewards pass by. She glances out the porthole...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She can see the DOCKING BAY below her. Just under the bay doors... ...a row of EMERGENCY ESCAPE PODS. Eve gets an idea. Grabs Wall-E and flies down the hallway...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve and Wall-E ride in uncomfortable silence. Their "WANTED" IMAGE plays on an elevator screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E points to it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve aims her gun at the screen. Blows it to pieces. Wall-E shrinks into a box. Never mind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dark. The elevator chimes. Eve and Wall-E step out. Rows of NUMBERED BAY DOORS line the hallway. Eve approaches "Bay #1". She and Wall-E enter...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: #1 - CONTINUOUS Eve navigates the dark. Approaches a freestanding CONSOLE. Fiddles with some buttons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He glances down at EVE'S HAND. Privately intertwines his fingers. Maybe now is the right moment...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Banks of controls light up around them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: is revealed at the end of the room. Its hatch automatically opens. Bathes the room with light from its lit interior. Eve turns to Wall-E:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She points to an OVERHEAD SCREEN. It displays coordinates to Earth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She gestures for Wall-E to enter the pod. He happily complies. Jumps up on one of the seats. Pats the seat next to him. Aren't you coming? Eve remains at the threshold. Shakes her head. Points to her chest. Makes her PLANT SYMBOL glow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...She's not going. This changes everything. Wall-E races out of the pod. Boxes up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve shakes her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Carries his box back into the pod. Exits. Wall-E follows her right back out. Drives behind the console. You can't make me. Eve sighs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The hallway elevator CHIMES. They both look up. Someone is coming. Eve shuts off everything. Lights go out. The pod closes back up. Both Eve and Wall-E hug the wall. Blend in with the other wall fixtures. They HEAR something hover into the     room. Can't see what it is. Then... An EPAULET ROBOT ARM rises up over     the console. Presses buttons. The pod lights up again. The hatch     opens. The stranger's SHADOW comes around     the console to reveal...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve and Wall-E look at each other. Gopher? They watch from the shadows as... ...Gopher enters the pod... ...opens his chest cavity... ...emits his suspension beam... ...and deposits the PLANT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gopher exits the pod.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She keeps her eyes on Gopher. Watches him return to the console. She turns to speak to Wall-E -- 52. He's gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E is inside the pod. Picks up the plant. Proudly shows it to Eve.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Too late. Gopher hits a button. The pod door shuts on Wall-E... ...and launches into space. Gopher shuts off the room. Exits. Eve leaps out of the shadows. Looks out the POD BAY WINDOW. Wall-E's pod rapidly shrinking in the distance. The plant icon on Eve's chest glows. She rushes to a narrow SERVICE AIRLOCK. Enters it like a phone booth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve bursts out into space. Rockets after Wall-E.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E plastered against the back of the pod. It suddenly reduces speed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He drops to the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Wall-E fumbles to get his bearings. Peers out the rear hatch window. Sees the Axiom receding from view.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He clambers up into the pilot's seat. Pulls back hard on the throttle. Nothing happens. Looks down at the console.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) You are now free to move around the cabin.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: is counting down:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh oh. Wall-E frantically hits the SELF-DESTRUCT button. No change. Pushes every button on the console. Everything activates: ...Lights flash... ...Oxygen masks drop...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Windshield wipers activate... ...Flares fire off... ...Parachutes deploy...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Ten seconds till self-destruct... Wall-E panics. Looks for a means of escape. Spots the hatch. Grabs the pod's FIRE EXTINGUISHER. Shoots himself to the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pulls on the EMERGENCY EXIT LEVER. The hatch won't open!
direction.name: direction

result.heading: BACK INSIDE THE POD SHIP'S COMPUTER

dialogue.raw_text: Ten, nine, eight, seven, six, five, four, three, two...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: She races through space after him. Suddenly, in the distance, the POD EXPLODES.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Eve is gut-punched.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She flies towards the debris field, when -- Wall-E whizzes right past her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He holds the FIRE EXTINGUISHER. Uses it as a form of propulsion. Eve is consumed with relief. Chases after him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He points the extinguisher the other way. Attempts to fly back over to her. It's hard to steer... ...They rocket right past each other again...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve waits. Wall-E finally has the hang of steering. Fires short bursts. Very slowly...makes his way...to Eve. Gets extinguisher foam in her face. She giggles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He opens his compactor door. Pulls out the PLANT, still in the boot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...Sensors zero in on the plant... ...Confirm its authenticity... ...A MAP OF THE AXIOM appears... ...Draws directions to the bridge... ...A command flashes: "DELIVER TO AXIOM SUPERIOR"...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Eve is ecstatic. She snaps the plant up with her tractor beam. Seals it safely in her chest. Then scoops up Wall-E in her arms. Spins him around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E can't believe his luck. Rests his head on her shoulder. Bliss. Eve stops spinning. Leans her head against his. A tiny ARC OF ELECTRICITY passes between them. A "thank you" kiss. Wall-E's METER spikes. He floats circles in space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She reaches for his hand. Wall-E shakes his head. Holds up his extinguisher instead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kicks on the extinguisher. Spins in a pirouette... ...and flies away. Eve giggles. Chases after him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The two fly around the stern of the ship. Wall-E does a few barrel rolls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve giggles. Matches him move for move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The pair fly between the BOOSTER ENGINES of the ship. Weave in and out of the rocket flames. Bank up along the ship's port side. Execute a double helix in perfect unison...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Passengers hover down the hallway. All focused on their private screens. No one looks out at the stars. ...except for MARY. She has pulled over to the side. Stares wistfully out the DECK WINDOW.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Spots EVE & WALL-E dancing among the stars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She backs up to wave hello. Bumps into JOHN'S HOVER CHAIR.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mary leans over to his armrest. Turns off his holo-screen. Points out the window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E flies past the window. A wave of recognition hits John. He comes to life, as if wakened from a long sleep.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They both wave until Wall-E's out of sight. John absentmindedly lowers his hand to his armrest... ...and touches Mary's hand. Both turn towards each other. They make eye contact for the first time. Awkward beat.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Oooh... (recognizes Wall-E) Hey, that's what's his name --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Hey... I know that guy! It's, uh... (snaps fingers) Wall-E! Hey Wall-E! It's your buddy, John!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: They soar across the Axiom's bow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Auto busy operating the ship. Doesn't see Eve and Wall-E outside the window. Auto turns the SKY DIAL from DAY TO NIGHT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The sky dome fast-forwards to evening.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: OVER to the top of the bridge tower. The windows of the Captain's quarters are dark. Only the FLICKERING GLOW OF A HOLO-SCREEN lights the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: NIGHT - SAME The Captain is still engrossed in his Earth research.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: litter the screen. Crops, farms, a barn, etc.... An IMAGE OF PEOPLE SQUARE DANCING pops up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An aperture opens in the ceiling above. Auto lowers down to face the Captain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Auto shuts off the holo-screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Auto rises back up to the bridge. The aperture shuts. Lights out. The Captain glares at the ceiling. Then whispers conspiratorially to the computer.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) "Hoedown" - a social gathering at which lively dancing would take place.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Auto! Earth is amazing! (points to images) These are called "farms". Humans would put seeds in the ground, pour water on them, and they'd grow food, like, pizza --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Psst! Computer. (the holo-screen lights up) Define "dancing".
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Eve and Wall-E descend along the starboard side. Spiral gracefully around one another.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E's extinguisher runs out of foam. He lets it float freely out into space. Eve catches him in her arms. Wall-E croons.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (V.O.) "Dancing" - A series of movements, involving two partners, where speed and rhythm match harmoniously with music.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Eve scans the Axiom for a way in. Notices SPARKS. Down on the ship's lower hull...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: R ON LOWER HULL A REPAIR-BOT (BURN-E) welds an antenna. Eve and Wall-E fly into the open hatch behind him. It shuts. Burn-e bangs on the closed door. Stuck outside.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: (beeps) [Hey! Let me in! Let me in!] (looks around) [Crap.]
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) The Lido Deck is now closing...The Lido Deck is now closing. The last few passengers exit the pool area. All wearing the same color blue uniforms... ...except TWO RED ONES still in the pool.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They ripple the surface of the pool. John and Mary float over the water's surface. Splash one another playfully.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: I didn't know we had a pool.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: (glorified megaphone) lowers from its tower. Reprimands them from the pool's edge:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: John splashes the robot. It shorts out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve and Wall-E sneak onto the deck. Hide between a ROW OF TOWEL CARTS. Eve peeks through the towels. Surprised to discover TWO STEWARDS. On duty in front of the bridge lobby entrance. No way in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: passes. Dumps its load down a nearby TRASH CHUTE. Eve keys in on the chute. It runs all the way up the tower... ...to the bridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He stares at EVE'S HAND. Time to seize the moment. Hits the PLAY BUTTON on his chest. It Only Takes a Moment plays from his scratchy speaker. Puts his hands together... Eve whips around. What's that noise?! Wall-E holds his hands up to Eve...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve immediately shuts off his music. Shoves his hands down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She places a stack of towels on his head. Gestures for Wall-E to stay put. Points to her PLANT LIGHT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Before Wall-E can even protest she is gone. Zooms silently across the Lido Deck. Up into the trash chute.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It sits in space. The AXIOM glides towards it. Something's not right. We reveal the CAPTAIN'S FINGERS holding the ship...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Captain sits by his window to space. Holds a toy AXIOM MODEL over his GLOBE OF EARTH.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ON TRASH CAN NOISES. Eve bursts out from it, like an angel. Blows the lid off. The Captain is stunned by this vision. She opens her chest to reveal... ...the plant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve hovers over to him. Salutes. Formally presents him the plant. He takes it in his hands. Still potted in the old boot. Gazes at it in wonder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve shrugs. Doesn't know how to answer.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He turns to his console. Hits a button.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: [Rocket noises] Prepare for landing... [Landing noises] We're here everybody! Yeah, Captain! [crowd cheers] Captain we're home! It's so beautiful! [crowd cheers]...No it's nothing. I was pleased to do it. It's all about you people --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: We can go back home...for the first time! (laughs) What's it like now?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: No, no! Don't tell me! I want to see for myself!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: rises from a panel. The Captain sticks it to the side of Eve's head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: projects from the device. Plays back images of her time on Earth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: rapidly scroll past. All displayed from Eve's POV: ...Being delivered to Earth... ...Flying above the devastated landscape... ...Blowing up a rock... ...Scans of numerous trash locations...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He looks over to his computer screen. The BEAUTY IMAGES OF EARTH still on display. Compares them with what plays on Eve's screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His face drops. Slumps in defeat. The dream is over.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Wait...that doesn't look like Earth... Where's the blue sky...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: The HELLO DOLLY clip of POYSC plays... It stirs the Captain out of his funk. He looks up at the screen. Leans in for a closer look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A rueful smile grows on his face. He looks down at
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: ...I know that song... (observes the dancers' feet) And they're... dancing. Yes, dancing!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: It's tapping in time to the music. His gaze drifts over to the plant in his hands. He lifts it up. Makes the boot dance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As if in response, the plant wilts slightly. A leaf drops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Captain urgently hovers across the room. Eve left alone. Her recorded memories continue playing... ...The clip changes to It Only Takes a Moment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Eve recognizes the music. Watches the lovers on screen hold hands. Something familiar about the gesture... Looks at her own hands. Slowly, she interlocks her fingers... ...Eve's eyes go wide. This is what Wall-E was trying to say to her. Her memories continue on the screen: ...a tap on the shoulder... ...Wall-E presents her the plant -- ...The screen goes BLACK! Then... ...SECURITY CAMERA FOOTAGE initiates. Wall-E's vigil for Eve plays out: ...protecting her from the rain... ...the sun...the sandstorm... ...keeping watch night and day... ...trying to jump start her heart...
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: ...You made it somehow, eh little guy? You didn't give up, did you?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (Gasp!) Oh no, no -- (remembers) Wait a minute.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: Amazed at Wall-E's selfless dedication to her. Realizes the meaning of Wall-E's love.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She looks at her hands again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: -UP OF WALL-E'S HANDS Still waiting between the towel racks. Rehearses holding out his hand to Eve.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Becomes impatient. Sneaks his way over to the GARBAGE CHUTE. Sticks his head in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No answer. The chute has an endless drop. Wall-E climbs in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Holds himself spread eagle to stay in place. Carefully inches his way up to the Captain's quarters...
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Ee-vah... Ee-VAH...? EEE-vah... (gives up; beeps) [I'll never get it right.]
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: A monorail pulls up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: steps off. Still hot on Wall-E's trail. Scrubs the dirty tracks towards the bridge lobby. Then notices Wall-E's FRESH TRACKS... ...leading to the trash chute.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Captain at his wet bar. Waters the plant in the sink.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He is struck with a notion. Stares out the window at space for a beat. Sees HIS REFLECTION holding the plant. Glances at his EARTH GLOBE.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Activates his chair's call button.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve is still watching Wall-E's vigil on the screen: ...playing Pong... ...Wall-E etches their names in a heart... Eve is lost in the moments. So touched.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's still waiting for her. She turns to leave and finds
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: There you go little guy. You came a long way for a drink of water... Just needed someone to look after you, that's all --
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (to himself) We have to go back.
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: lowering in front of her. Auto spots the plant in the Captain's hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: flashes on Auto's lens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heads for the elevator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Auto shoots back upstairs. Pops out another APERTURE in front of the elevator. Blocks the Captain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a stare down. Beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Auto rises back into the ceiling. Lowers down over the vanity console. High speed button pushing.
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: Auto, Eve found the plant. Fire up the Holo-detector.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Not necessary, Captain. You may give it to me.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (not listening) You know what? I should do it myself.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Sir, I insist you give me the plant.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Auto, get out of my way.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: What are you talking about? Why not?
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: That is classified. Captain, give me the plant.
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: (holds plant out of reach) What do you mean, "classified"? You don't keep secrets from the Captain!
dialogue.name: dialogue

dialogue.raw_text: Tell me, Auto! That's an order!
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: appears. Labeled: "TOP SECRET: FOR AUTOPILOT EYE ONLY". The BNL FANFARE plays. Cut to the BNL CEO at the podium. Haggard. Nervous. Wears an emergency oxygen vest. The fanfare plays too long.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The CEO races out of the room. The message cuts out. Auto turns to face the Captain. The Captain shakes his head in disgust.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Axiom zooms through hyperspace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The cockroach waits obediently on the hill. Exactly where Wall-E told him to stay. His antennae twitch with boredom.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: appears on the ground. The cockroach watches the dot run down the hillside. The ground begins to shake. Daylight dims. The insect looks to the sky.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: grows behind the clouds. Blots out the sunlight. The Axiom's keel breaks through. Its shadow swallows up the entire landscape. The cockroach senses his master's return.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: ON CLOUD COVER A DARK PATCH

direction.raw_text: rush past him. He eagerly chases after them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The city-size starliner lowers gracefully from the sky. Pushes back the clouds to the horizon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The CIRCLE OF DOTS triangulate over the abandoned berth. Converge over the port's LANDING SHAFT. Thousands of feet deep. The ship's keel descends into it. The earth shudders. Trash towers tumble in the distance. ...Then all is quiet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: open on the side of the ship.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: ON BELLY OF THE AXIOM A ROW OF GIANT DOORS

direction.raw_text: automatically extend. Connect with BUILT-IN TERMINALS on the port. The Captain walks out gingerly. Holding the boot w/ plant. The other passengers step out on their own legs. Wobble like toddlers. They squint up at the harsh sunlight. A commotion is heard from the back. Somebody trying to push through.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: appears out of the crowd. Cradles a BOXED UP WALL-E in her arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and the Rejects follow behind her. They rush across the gangway. The cockroach meets up with Eve. Climbs up onto Wall-E. Doesn't understand why his master isn't responding. Eve urgently scans the landscape. Locks on to WALL-E'S TRUCK in the distance. She takes to the air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and the Rejects chase after her down the gangway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Captain respectfully removes his hat. Good luck, friend.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The interior is dark and still. Suddenly the junk jingles and clinks as the back door opens. Eve flies inside with Wall-E. Sets him on the floor. She scans the rotating shelves at high speed. Grabs a CAR JACK. Ratchets up Wall-E's crushed body...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: S ...SPARE PARTS being grabbed by Eve... ...Frantically installs the new parts into Wall-E... ...Her arms a blur of precision in motion... ...Replaces his damaged CIRCUIT BOARD. The final piece... ...She opens his new solar panels... ...and BLASTS a hole in the ceiling with her gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The rejects stop. See the roof of Wall-E's truck explode. Oh no.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A shaft of sunlight beams down on Wall-E. Eve holds her breath, watches... Waits... ...Beep... ...Beep...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E's meter fully charges. His head slowly rises from his box. Blinks. The cockroach hops with joy. Eve is relieved. ...She holds out her hand to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E gives her a blank stare. He turns away from Eve. Motors out the truck. She grabs him. Turns him back around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E just stares. Doesn't seem to know who she is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She grabs the RUBIK'S CUBE and LIGHT BULB from the shelf. The light bulb glows in her hand. She gives them to Wall-E. No reaction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E looks blankly at the junk on the shelves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She hovers over to the video player. Plays HELLO DOLLY. Looks back to see if it has any effect. Wall-E is over at the shelves. Has scooped all his prized possessions into his compactor. Crushes them into a cube. Eve is gut-punched.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Wall-E motors outside. Runs over the cockroach on his way out. The insect pops back to life. Watches his friend in shock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E rolls up to a nearby trash pile. Scoops up trash. Spits out a cube. Eve hovers over to him. Still in disbelief.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E continues to stack his cubes. She stops him. Lifts his head. Stares into his eyes. Nobody home. Eve presses his "play" button. Nothing but STATIC. Eve begins to panic. Shakes him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No response. He's gone. She hovers in silence next to him for a long time... Finally, Eve grasps Wall-E's hand. Forces his fingers to interlace with hers. Holds him close one last time. Leans her head against his. Hums softly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She touches her forehead to his. Goodbye Wall-E.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: between them. Eve turns to hover away. Jerked back. Her fingers caught between his. She checks his eyes again. Nothing. But then...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ...a tiny SERVO NOISE. She looks down at their hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They start to move. Slowly close around Eve's. She looks back at his face. Wall-E's eyes gradually come into focus. His brows raise...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He notices their hands entwined. His dream come true.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She giggles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The "Hello Dolly" tape reaches the finale of IOTAM. "And that is all that love's about..."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eve and Wall-E stare into each other's eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: and the Rejects finally reach the truck. They begin to celebrate. Wall-E's alive! Then M-O realizes they need privacy. Herds the Rejects O.S.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wall-E and Eve's foreheads touch. Together now and ever more.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...and we'll recall when time runs out..."
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: UP OF THE PLANT 94. Newly planted in the earth. Small hands water it gently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: to reveal it surrounded by kids. The Captain instructs them. John and Mary help unload equipment from the Axiom. Robots and passengers stream off the ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The CAMERA PULLS OUT from the Axiom... ...over the bay...
direction.name: direction

dialogue.raw_text: This is called "farming"! You kids are going to grow all kinds of plants: vegetable plants, pizza plants! (laughs) Ahh, it's good to be home...
dialogue.name: dialogue

direction.raw_text: ...That it only took a moment..." ...past Wall-E & Eve holding hands in his truck... ...over M-O and the Rejects cleaning outside... ...Through the trash towers of the city... ...past a FIELD OF PLANTS, sprouting from its peak... ...up through the cloud cover... ...out into space...
direction.name: direction
